actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide for reimbursement of the cost of certain projects at the Fern Ridge Dam, Oregon.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Requires the repairs initiated at Fern Ridge Dam, Oregon, during FY2005 to be considered to be a dam safety project (as that term is defined by the Chief of Engineers), and the cost of such repairs to be reimbursable under the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 (except the portion allocated to irrigation as a project benefit).

titles.title: A bill to provide for reimbursement of the cost of certain projects at the Fern Ridge Dam, Oregon.
